hwr = wthr.HourlyWeatherReport(lat=self.lat, lon=self.lon, date=self.day,
    time=self.day.time())
with wthr.session_scope(self.wcname) as session:
    self.assertTrue(os.path.exists(self.wcname.replace(
        'sqlite+pysqlite:///', '')))
    self.assertTrue(isinstance(session, Session))
    session.add(hwr)
t = self.session.query(wthr.HourlyWeatherReport).all()
self.assertTrue(len(t) == 1)
with wthr.session_scope(self.wcname) as session:
    session.add(hwr)
    session.add(hwr)
t = self.session.query(wthr.HourlyWeatherReport).all()
self.assertTrue(len(t) == 1)
